items.title: ManuFarm
items.description: Modern landing page for an agricultural business with product catalog integration and contact forms. Delivered in 5 days.
items.testimonial: NorthPixel transformed our online presence in less than a week. The site is beautiful, fast, and our inquiries have doubled.

items.title: TechConsult Pro
items.description: Professional consulting website with service pages, team profiles, and a blog system for thought leadership content.
items.testimonial: We needed a professional website fast. NorthPixel delivered exactly what we needed on time and on budget.

items.title: Nordic Craft Shop
items.description: Small e-commerce store featuring handmade Nordic crafts with payment integration and inventory management.
items.testimonial: From concept to live store in under two weeks. The site is easy to manage and sales have been fantastic.
